circumstances: On final approach to Kazan Airport, the crew encountered poor visibility due to foggy conditions. The pilot continued the approach and descended too low, causing the airplane to struck the ground and to crash 6 km short of runway. All four crew members were injured and the airplane was damaged beyond repair.
probable_cause: The decision of the pilot to continue the approach in poor visibility and his failure to return to his departure point or to divert to a suitable airport.
